studyArms.name: AION BIOSYSTEMS tempshield
studyArms.description: Participants wear the AION BIOSYSTEMS tempshield continuous temperature monitoring device on the upper chest for up to 7 hours with oral temperature measurements taken every 2 hours using Welch Allyn 901053 Electronic Thermometer as comparator

studyCohorts.name: Febrile
studyCohorts.characteristic: Participants with oral temperature measurement of 99.5째F or above

studyCohorts.name: Non-febrile
studyCohorts.characteristic: Participants who never exceed 99.5째F and remain within normal temperature range

arms.name: AION BIOSYSTEMS tempshield
arms.description: Participants wear the AION BIOSYSTEMS tempshield continuous temperature monitoring device on the upper chest for up to 7 hours with oral temperature measurements taken every 2 hours using Welch Allyn 901053 Electronic Thermometer as comparator

cohorts.name: Febrile
cohorts.characteristic: Participants with oral temperature measurement of 99.5째F or above

cohorts.name: Non-febrile
cohorts.characteristic: Participants who never exceed 99.5째F and remain within normal temperature range

epochs.name: Acclimation
epochs.description: 60 minutes for tempshield to acclimate to environment before first oral temperature measurement

epochs.name: Monitoring
epochs.description: Up to 7 hours of continuous temperature monitoring with oral temperature measurements every 2 hours
